Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class CurrencyDataController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.CurrencyDataController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/currency-data") public class CurrencyDataController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling currency data related requests. It provides endpoints for updating and fetching all currencies and finding a currency by its type.

  • Method Details

    • updateAndFetchAllCurrencies

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_USER\', \'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<CurrencyData>> updateAndFetchAllCurrencies()
      This method is used to update and fetch all currencies.
      Returns:
      A list of all currency data.

    • findByCurrency

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{currency}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_USER\', \'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CurrencyData> findByCurrency(@PathVariable("currency") String currencyType)
      This method is used to find a currency by its type.
      Parameters:
      currencyType - The type of the currency.
      Returns:
      The currency data of the given type.
